name: The Ball Pit
description:
You find yourself in a mysterious playroom with only one way out.... Grab and throw balls to solve puzzles. Will you be able to escape The Ball Pit?

We are aware of some bugs and issues found within the game, but any feedback is greatly appreciated. Please bare in mind that this is our first 3D game project and we hope to make updates to the game to imporve certain aspects further along the line. :)
